sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form :class="classList" @submit.prevent="createSectionI">
    <input v-model="title" type="text" class="shadow shadow-lg p-4 cursor-pointer font-bold text-xl text-white rounded-md bg-soft-white backdrop-filter backdrop-blur-md border-simple border border-white border-opacity-10 placeholder-white" placeholder="New Post-It" @focusin="startEditing" @focusout="finishEditing"/>
    <button v-if="isActive || titleExists" type="submit" class="mt-4 p-4 bg-gray-600 font-bold text-xl text-white rounded-md">+ Add</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>

import { mapActions } from 'vuex'

export default{
  data(){
    return {
      title: '',
      isActive: false,
    }
  },
  computed: {
    classList(){
      let classList = ['addSection'];
      if(this.isActive){
        classList.push('active');
      }
      return classList;
    },
    titleExists(){
      return this.title.length > 0;
    },
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapActions(["createSection"]),
    createSectionI(){
      this.createSection({ title: this.title});
      this.title = '';
    },
    startEditing(){
      this.isActive = true;
    },
    finishEditing(){
      this.isActive = false;
    },
  },
}
</script>
